channel.title: Software on Brodie Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Software on Brodie Blog

item.title: New Blog 2018
item.description: This week I've been working on yet another new blog. It feels a little silly, since I never manage to keep up with writing entries, but maybe this time will be different. It's also a very small enjoyable project that I can finish and cross off the list. The current version feels pretty similar to last time, but the trick is that this time I'm statically generating the pages offline in C++.

item.title: Productivity Streak
item.description: finished a bunch of tiny projects!"/ I seem to be getting a whole lot done lately. I have a new blog system set up, and I've made a few silly websites for Lauralee. I've been playing with Android Studio and Unity! I've also gotten in the routine of reading and doing yoga! Silly Websites Webcomic Bubblegum Machine I made a website that dispenses comics for Lauralee.
